title: Implement WebGL extension EXT_sRGB
body: The WebGL extension EXT_sRGB was community approved May 2014 and may be implemented. https://www.khronos.org/registry/webgl/extensions/EXT_sRGB/

comments.body: Feedback has been ignored since June 2015. Issue link: https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-edge/platform/issues/10570698/
